titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to change the position of the Director of the Census Bureau to level IV from level V in the Executive Schedule.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.
Referred to Subcommittee on Human Resources.
Subcommittee on Census and Population Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House by House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service. Report No: 100-592.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 2/3/1988--Introduced. Changes the position of the Director of the Bureau of the Census from level V to level IV in the Executive Schedule.
